title: What are the mistakes should I don't do in class 11th and 12th? - Quora

response.answer_text: The first thing that you should not do is take up science unless you are ready to give 100% of your efforts in that field , opt for commerce or arts in case you are not sure about taking up science . secondly ,Do not be negligent of your studies in class 11 , study enough just to clear your basics and lastly do not panic about performing outstandingly well.

At first don't at all worry about 11th std as it does not play any role… Just focus on 12th std as it's very important to gain good marks in 12th std. While solving Accounts paper keep your concepts clear & try to make less corrections. In other subjects, learn the head points of each answers which will help to write answers more efficiently.
